title: The light of the world a most true relation of a pilgrimess, M. Antonia Bourignon travelling towards eternity ... : divided into three parts ... / written originally in French, and faithfully translated into English ; to which is added, a preface to the English reader.
author: Bourignon, Antoinette, 1616-1680.
notes: Translation of the author's La lumiere du monde.
The 2nd and 3rd parts each have special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
